website_summaries.verdict: Affordable and effective alternative to spray insect repellents. Contains enough DEET to combat biting insects and mosquitoes in jungles and rain forests, but for home use as well.
pros: Very minimal odor, and sweat-resistant when dry
cons: Wears off quickly under wet conditions
Can feel sticky on skin, and challenging to remove

customer_reviews.title: Best. Repellent. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two tubes for a true test: traveling for two weeks through mosquito-overrun Belize. Test passed with flying colors. In the middle of a jungle wildlife sanctuary, we could see and hear mosquitoes all around us, and walked out without a bite. Best of all, it's neither as greasy nor as smelly as most serious DEET-based products I've used previously. Two tips: a little goes a very long way; we spread it thin, and it lasted for hours. And, since it's not a spray, make sure to cover some easy-to-forget places, like the back of your hands (where I did get a couple of bites) -- remembering to reapply if you wash them!
customer_reviews.author: Borisgoodenough

customer_reviews.title: Delivery was right on time. So far, the ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was right on time. So far, the cream works, and works for at least 12 hours to prevent fleas from biting. I have had a flea problem in my house for months, and even though I have used flea bombs 3 times now, they still show up. I kept 2 cats inside, but when I started letting them onto the screened porch, they both got fleas. My friend friend took them while he bombed the house the first time, and still has them. He says they are not biting or scratching at all there. Maybe I am bringing them inside from the yard after working in the gardens. In any case, this cream has been a godsend for me!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra S.

customer_reviews.title: Mosquitoes bewhere!! This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: When traveling to Southeast Asia my husband and I needed to get shots in order to protect ourselves against insects bites. As an added precaution we heard about this product and brought it along! While I'm not advocating to not get your shots before traveling overseas, We were extremely amazed how well this product work. You can use it sparingly and it will last all day! Even while you sweat ( however, we did reapply just to be sure). Hope this helped! ❤ C.Hamilton
customer_reviews.author: C.Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Works. Perfect amount of DEET.
customer_reviews.text: It might seem pricey, but it works. Kept ticks and mosquitos off of me in Nicaragua while others were getting eaten. My Health Dept. nurse who gives me my travel immunizations recommended this years ago and I've always stayed with it. Her reasoning for the endorsement: it's just enough DEET. Anything more doesn't offer you "more" protection so you're just poisoning yourself.
customer_reviews.author: D.Nuttz

customer_reviews.title: Only thing I use when fostering cats
customer_reviews.text: I have fostered cats/worked with neighorhood cats in a casual capacity for about 4 years and have unfortunately come into contact with fleas more often than I would like. I am also very allergic to their bites and break out into rashes/hives on my legs where they latch on to bare skin. I use this when I sleep and while it smells less than awesome, it is the only flea/insect repellent I recommend for hot/humid areas!
customer_reviews.author: O truant Muse

customer_reviews.title: OMG so good for the wayward bugs of the world...
customer_reviews.text: I went overseas for the first time to Sri Lanka and Thailand and I used the repellent every day and not a single bug touched me and even when I did not have it on at night or during the day it was so useful and I was not bitten. I will use this stuff more than Skin so Soft by Avon on my next trips. Also, even when I was gone for two weeks I still had some left from the first bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Sakurakiss18

customer_reviews.title: This Stuff Really Works
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because my 2 year old's pediatrician recommended bug repellent lotion instead of spray. My son gets SO many bug bites and has an awful reaction to them. After using this at an 8 hour family bbq, outside, in the woods(mind you, i only applied this lotion one time about 15 mins before the party)... he came home with NO bug bites, i'm still shocked!!! The tubes are sort of small, but i am going to stock up because this stuff worked WONDERS. I am a happy momma.
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla

customer_reviews.title: holy moly it works
customer_reviews.text: Went to Laos - where lots of terrifying things can bite and sting and f you up, but this stuff WORKS no bites, a little strong of a smell but doesn't linger or stain clothes, thick formula to ensure coverage A+ if you don't want to get bit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just received. I Think its working. Will up ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received. I Think its working. Will up date. The cream is a bit greasy with no smell that I could find. Just read the directions and says don't ware under cloths. Not sure how that will work. I bought this to put on my feet, ankles and legs. I am being eaten alive. I then have to ware socks and shoes. Yes they get in there.
customer_reviews.author: PA Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Sticky mess
customer_reviews.text: very sad to find out I couldn't return this. especially since I purchased 2 of them to get a better deal. maybe this product repels insects sufficiently but I couldn't wait to find that out. after applying this product the awful stickiness of it was so unbearable I had to scrub it off in the shower immediately. it took two scrubbings just to get it off. bad product. very inconvenient in use.
customer_reviews.author: K. Leissner

customer_reviews.title: It worked better than the mosquito nets
customer_reviews.text: Needed this for a safari in Kenya. It worked better than the mosquito nets, it's thrilling to watch frustrated mosquitos come close but recoil in horror every time they near your skin. I should note that this stuff smells like and has the consistency of house paint. It dissolved my nail polish and a few plastic products I came in contact with. But I have no mosquito bites to worry about, so it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still found myself swatting away flies
customer_reviews.text: While I feel this product protected me somewhat from insects, it didn't have nearly the same effect as the picaridin lotion that was included in my 3 pack of insect repellents. I found that the black flies that would show up early morning and late evening wouldn't mind either way if I was wearing this lotion or not. Despite that, I didn't notice mosquitos. The smell was minimal from the lotion, and I know it lasts the hours that they advertise. If you're looking to repel mosquitos, this is good. If it's biting flies, try something else.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Works better than deet spray
customer_reviews.text: I first bought this for my trip to Thailand. After only getting bitten once, I bought some more for my Bali trip. This product is amazing! It definitely does the job and as long as you apply in a cool place, it will not dry sticky. I applied sunblock first, let it dry, then applied this lotion and I was protected all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No bites!
customer_reviews.text: We took this to Costa Rica, and didn't get any bites when we had this on. Also great that it can go in carry on luggage. It is really thick, but a little goes a long way. 2 people used this daily for 1 week and went through about one bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Best DEET bug lotion
customer_reviews.text: It last for much longer than 'regular' DEET. The only downside is the price. If you want to put it on, and not worry about reapplying it for many hours, this is the stuff for ya.
customer_reviews.author: Brooks Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great product, wish it was a spray.
customer_reviews.text: My son was complaining about fleas and other pests in our large backyard. Since he's been applying this before going out to play, he hasn't complained once. Would give it 5 stars but a spray would be much more convenient.
customer_reviews.author: James in D.C.

customer_reviews.title: It’s so bad I had to take all my polish off because ...
customer_reviews.text: Sticks to my nails! It’s so bad I had to take all my polish off because it just formed a really thick build up and I was sticking to everything. If you can manage to keep it off your nails, it’s not bad. Seems to work but not worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Better than any bug spray and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these and took them to Jamaica with me considering the mosquito scare and didn't even finish 1 whole tube after being there for 1 full week with 4 family members. This stuff is awesome! It stays on for literally 12 hours unless you wash it off with soap beforehand - doesn't wipe away in the pool or ocean water. This is my new bug-spray - not nearly as waste full as the sprays, so much cheaper and all around a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy H.

customer_reviews.title: When only the best will do
customer_reviews.text: If you need heavy duty bug repellent, this is the one you want. DEET is really the only effective repellent available now. Others work, but if you are birding in the swamp, you need something that REALLY works. The trick is to keep the DEET on the surface of your skin instead of absorbed into it. The matrix used in Utlrathon is the best that I have found. You'll want two tubes for when you can't find the other one. Otherwise, it lasts quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: The Other J. Hargrove

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. I booked myself a rainforest hike excursion during my trip in Costa Rica and thought this product would keep the mosquitoes away. It did not work at all. I applied the lotion in the car on the way to the hiking site, and as soon as i exited the car I was almost immediately swarmed by mosquitoes. I even attempted to reapply the lotion there, however it still did not work. I ended up with numerous mosquito bites by the end of the hike. Do not purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uganda mosquito proof
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as recommended by the health department for a mission trip to Uganda. It worked great. No complaints. It's not your typical mosquito repellent that you spray but if traveling to another country where bites can be a health concern, this product is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Massey

customer_reviews.title: I think it works
customer_reviews.text: I recently took a trip to Haiti. I used this product on my exposed skin, and treated my clothing with Permethrin. I think the combo worked, as I don't recall getting any mosquito bites. I was a little nervous to use this product, as it said to be careful around materials such as watch bands. I didn't experience any redness on my skin, and my watch is still intact which is good. Still, I think I will save this for extreme outdoor trips, not for casual use.
customer_reviews.author: callidiscope

customer_reviews.title: Live on river with the mosquitos
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great! The store bought DEET sprays are a mess on the face and have never worked well. After 15 years on the river I finally tried ultrathon and it not only works longer than 12 hrs (zero bites on the face for 2 months now) but also has healed marks from prior bites on my forehead.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying a no bite summer.
customer_reviews.text: This works. All I do is rub a tiny bit between my palms and then rub my arms, legs and neck. I've found that just as long as the scent is still on my hands, it repels insects by rubbing on the scent. Better than sprays because there's no waste whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely, I mean EXTREMELY, prone to mosquito bites... I traveled to Africa and parts of South America, and I don't think I got bit, (probably once in Ecuador, but that was all). It's smelly but I don't care. I hate mosquitoes.
customer_reviews.author: JacobSoto

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money product did not work as promised. Are usually base my decisions on reviews from other buyers but this one was an absolute failure
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Out in the jungle this kept the mosquitos away. And there were a lot of them all over everyone else. Does nothing to repel sand fleas if you're on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: THIS WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: What I like most is that THIS WORKS! Have tried many mosquito repellents, usually disappointed in the results. (Bites behind the knees! Bites on elbows, bites everywhere just about. But this lotion WORKS! No bites. None. None!
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: I got this specifically for my trips to Japan which ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this specifically for my trips to Japan which I always end up coming home with bites all over me. This stuff WORKS as described, I had hardly any bites! The only thing is it's really thick but I'll gladly trade having thick stuff plastered on my skin vs. a hundred bites.
customer_reviews.author: WC_VIP_Y34

customer_reviews.title: Didn't get bit once
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is excellent for keeping away the biting pests. After it dries, it has no odor either. But the reason I only gave it 4 stars is because if you live or are visiting a humid and hot area, you will feel 10 times stickier than you do without it. So just be warned on that. Otherwise, it worked amazingly! I didnt get bit once on my entire trip that I was using this for.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: I would also recommend disposable insect replant wipes if you are traveling where ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this in India on a business trip and it was worth it. There is an initial odor but it goes away. I would also recommend disposable insect replant wipes if you are traveling where there could be disease carrying bugs.
customer_reviews.author: burnsb

customer_reviews.title: I used this in the Amazon jungle and came away ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this in the Amazon jungle and came away with absolutely zero bites. Bugs gave me an 8 inch bubble at all times, and would stop in their tracks at that point even when making a beeline for me initially. I did use a spray on my clothes, since can't apply lotion there, but was in a tank top and shorts the whole time, which is typically advised against, but this gave me the confidence to ignore the advice and go out more exposed than I should have.
customer_reviews.author: klonnq

customer_reviews.title: This is great product for repelling mosquitoes
customer_reviews.text: This is great product for repelling mosquitoes, it has really bad smell (as do most repellents) and leaves you feeling really sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Sputnik1

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our trip to Bali. Applied it everywhere: arms, legs, back, neck, etc. i did NOT get bit by anything at all. This product is amazing. Scent is very light and it feels like lotion. It doesn’t feel oily at all.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta

customer_reviews.title: Never was bitten!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my trip to India. The repellent worked perfectly. Unfortunately, and I don't think there is anything 3M can do, it is a bit greasy and sticky. It also stripped off my nail polish. That is just a trade off for knowing you won't be bitten by anything!
customer_reviews.author: ej

customer_reviews.title: Slightly greasy
customer_reviews.text: The product works as advertised. I compared this with Repel 40 lotion in Honduras and it seemed to be a little bit more effective. The product did leave a noticeable greasy residue on your skin but to be honest when you're slathered with sunscreen and bug lotion all day, a little bit more residue isn't that big of a deal. The other issue which is common to all lotions is that it's harder to apply than a spray which means you're more likely to miss a spot. I'm going to be trying the Repel 40 spray on my next trip but I'll be taking this with me as a proven backup.
customer_reviews.author: Brenden R. Mcelroy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. I usually don’t trust mosquito repellent, but I was extremely impressed. I took it to the BWCA, and it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Serrano Rivera

customer_reviews.title: I have used this product for many years. My ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for many years . My husband is outdoors a lot and has advanced medical training . He has used it and got me to try it when we had standing water from heavy rains. If in doubt ask your doctor.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent repellent.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well while I was in Thailand. There were mosquitoes everywhere while I was in Thailand and this stuff was a life saver. I got in the routine of showering, applying this bug repellent and then applying sunscreen. It kept me from being eaten alive by bugs.
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: BEST
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bug repellant that I have ever used! It is a must have for my travels.
customer_reviews.author: BLESSED

customer_reviews.title: Leaked everywhere., can't return.
customer_reviews.text: Leaked everywhere in the package, which I didn't notice until I opened it after the return window. Gross.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works better than pretty much any other bug spray product i've used.
customer_reviews.author: Dane-asaur

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly moisturizing, no smell, worked really well. My friend used a bug spray and it was nowhere near as effective as this.
customer_reviews.author: Rockstar

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works great but not a great smell and is very thick on you
customer_reviews.author: Ti

customer_reviews.title: Never going on a trip without it
customer_reviews.text: As someone who is usually tortured by mosquitos wherever I go, I was doubtful that something could actually keep mosquitos from biting me, until I tried ultrathon. I used this everyday during my time in Tanzania both on Safari and when I was at the beach. The reason I know it worked is because on the day I ran out of Ultrathon, I got 20 mosquito bites almost instantly. I tried borrowing some spray deet from a friend and that did not work nearly as well as the ultrathon. From now on I will be taking double the amount I think I'll need for trips abroad and at home!
customer_reviews.author: Sabine Alam

customer_reviews.title: Handy and useful, but not great
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Expensive. The cheaper 40% Deet can be sprayed on and wipe over the area as easy, but it gives off fumes. It does not last 12 hours for me. It is handy to carry with you.
customer_reviews.author: Inquiring mind KJ

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it once so far, but no bites!!!
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Insect Repellent
customer_reviews.text: The cream works pretty well. It has the highest concentration of DEET of any other product I've used (34.34%). I sweat a lot and I experienced it enduring for 4 to 5 hours instead of the 12 hours listed on the container. The containers are also extremely small, only 2oz, so a bottle only lasted about a week. This is with applying the cream on my legs, arms, head, and neck. I will probably buy Sawyers insect repellent next time just because it is a larger bottle. The DEET content is not quite so large (20%), but I haven't been able to notice the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Edward C. Bruner

customer_reviews.title: Great!  Need a bigger size option.
customer_reviews.text: Four stars b/c I wish this came in a bigger size. It is thick and does the job to repel insects. I have tried many things b/c I seem to be a mosquito magnet. I was very pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Pazz

customer_reviews.title: product arrived on time and was well packaged/ this product ...
customer_reviews.text: product arrived on time and was well packaged/ this product does exactly what it states it does , repel. Thank you, R
customer_reviews.author: Rosie Tovar

customer_reviews.title: Great protection without the irritation
customer_reviews.text: Even though this is strong with Deet, it does not bother my skin. It goes on like lotion and has kept the bugs away. I buy it now for any trip overseas where malaria is an issue.
customer_reviews.author: James Wartian

customer_reviews.title: ... used many bug repellents this is by far the best one I have used
customer_reviews.text: I have used many bug repellents this is by far the best one I have used.
customer_reviews.author: ZachVWTDI

customer_reviews.title: feel truly protected
customer_reviews.text: Recommended to us by the foreign travel nurse who gave us our travel immunizations and used by the US military. This repellent is easy to use and protects you from all of the insects that carry the horrible diseases we all dread when on a trip to an exotic locale. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: TheresaT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the standard to follow. Just discipline to apply it is a personal problem.
customer_reviews.author: Terry S

customer_reviews.title: Stuff works great tested it in a place they call mosquito lagoon ...
customer_reviews.text: Stuff works great tested it in a place they call mosquito lagoon which it has the name for a reason little goes long way don't have a bad smell to it like the spary......But down does leave like a layer on your skin so if you wipe you legs or area it's apply to then back on your hands lol
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Thank goodness I did not need this as much as ...
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness I did not need this as much as i thought in Belize. It goes on very smooth and doesnt smell
customer_reviews.author: Anne Butterworth

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT! It protected me from all the grubby, biting critters in the Kenya safari parks. I would recommend carefully following the directions for use. I'm the only one who came back without a SINGLE bite of any kind. Better living thru chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: soul seeker

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff, used by the military
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff, used by the military. It definitely keeps the bugs off you and a wide variety at that, easy on and lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: James T.

customer_reviews.title: Needed for travel abroad.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work. Very thick. Expensive. I use it for traveling outside of the country. This stuff was recommended by our company doctor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: product I can trust.
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my india trip. haven't got a single bite from mosquito. So, I trust this product very much.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: This Works
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a mosquito magnet. This does the job in keeping insects away. It has, to date, been the only product that truly works. Have used all sorts of insect repellant creams and sprays and this by far has done the job to satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: JED

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product , I have taken it to India and camping in the mountains . I am very sensitive to smell and I hardly notice the smell at all .
customer_reviews.author: Crystal D. Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Simply put - this stuff works. I was not bit one time while using this product during my trip to Central America. One day, after spenting 4 hours in the water, I was able to stand on the beach and not get eaten alive by sandnats, while my friends took turns slapping their already bitten skin.
customer_reviews.author: JR Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Not a single bite. Loved it.
customer_reviews.text: No smell. I used this lotion in Africa. On Safari, in villages, at night, everywhere. Not a single bite. Loved it. Small enough to carry in you backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: when you need a nice juicy slathering of DEET, this gets the job done. compact and non aerosol, travels well. recommended.
customer_reviews.text: when you need a nice juicy slathering of DEET, this gets the job done. compact and non aerosol, travels well. recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Perspectech

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't smell great, feels a little greasy but works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is one component of the "DOD system" developed for military use and it the most effective insect repellent I have ever used. It really lasts. Doesn't smell great, feels a little greasy, but works very well.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomerJM

customer_reviews.title: Great insect reppellent
customer_reviews.text: Only got one mosquito bite my entire trip! Do recommend getting a larger size if needed for more than a few days
customer_reviews.author: Hazel

customer_reviews.title: Cant get enough
customer_reviews.text: Thanks stuff works miracles. Use it in your backyard or the jungles of Belize. It will keep you safe and protected.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps mosquitoes away ! Works well !
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works. We traveled all over Thailand and other Asian countries and this product really keeps the mosquitoes away. We worked with a doctor certified in Travel Medicine to prepare for our Asia trip and he was the one that recommended this product to our family. It does not smell. But it does feel sticky on your skin after you apply it which can be annoying when you are in hot/humid weather environment. But the point is to keep the mosquitoes away and this product does it very well.
customer_reviews.author: YDA

customer_reviews.title: It essentially feels like you've been dumped in a jar of sticky grease ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the most uncomfortable insect repellent I've ever worn. It essentially feels like you've been dumped in a jar of sticky grease that never hardens or soaks into the skin. You feel like gum stuck to a bottom of a shoe, sticking to everything. The worst part is that it's extremely hard to wash off. It took a couple showers until I finally felt stick-free. Will never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: brick_house01

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I attract mosquitoes and I'm allergic to their bites. This worked well while I was in Belize.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bugs stayed away from us all day and it lasted the whole day! Definitely recommend this brand. It's a lot smaller than expected, but a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bouchard

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: This works! I am in need of extra "bug" protection and this seems to do the trick. I would recommend this product to anyone that wishes to enjoy the outdoors again.
customer_reviews.author: penny rich

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you wash your hands after applying
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. Not one bite since I started using it. If you are using it for outdoor sport activities, know that it will feel like there is a small film on your hands after applying it. One of the first times I used it was on the golf course and I couldn't grip the clubs without them slipping in my hands for the first hour after use. Make sure you throughly wash your hands after applying the cream.
customer_reviews.author: Corky

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but
customer_reviews.text: It really works but I had issues with dispensing and quantity. As it is so small for the money a applied with caution so as to not run out. Next time I will buy the one with the applicator as it will apply the required amount and last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Parth Vasa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm on our tour of Costa Rica, home to the Zika virus. No bites at all.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Used for 2 weeks on a safari in ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Used for 2 weeks on a safari in Tanzania. Not a single mosquito bite for my partner and I.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great!
customer_reviews.text: We did a trip to a very mosquito prone area, and we needed a lotion that could go through the airports without any problems, and that had enough deet level to actually keep our kids bite free, this lotion met both requirements!
customer_reviews.author: Calli02

customer_reviews.title: Works good.
customer_reviews.text: I add this to some lotion and it works great. It's so thick. Will last awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tried many others, this is the best!
customer_reviews.text: I used 3M Ultrathon for a month while hiking the Appalachian Trail in Maine. Mosquitos were particularly bad in the Hundred Mile Wilderness, but when I applied Ultrathon I did not get bitten. I had previously used repellents with 100% DEET which repelled the bugs but left my skin feeling sticky all day. With Ultrathon lotion my skin felt the same as it does when I apply sunscreen;smooth and dry. Ultrathon is the best repellant I have ever used. It will be in my pack for all future trips.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Mosquitoes LOVE this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and sons used this on a camping trip. They said it not only did not keep the bugs away, it actually seemed to attract them. They said that deep woods off works better.
customer_reviews.author: St. Faustina

customer_reviews.title: oh well...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product and the same from Sawyer. It's effective, that's for sure, but it's very sticky and greasy... it is hard to apply to the skin and I don't like how it feels. It also has the typical DEET smell. the Sawyer product is much smoothers and less greasy, it feels like a liquid lotion and also smells much less... I would buy next time only the Sawyer product.
customer_reviews.author: Michel

customer_reviews.title: 3M Ultrathon SRL-12 2 Oz Insect Repellent Lotion - 2 PACK
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I've had Lyme disease twice and I wouldn't dream of going outdoors without it. Protection lasts all day, unlike other repellents.
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: It worked but it’s sticky
customer_reviews.text: It works the only thing is that the consistency of it is sooooo sticky so if it’s hot omg it annoying
customer_reviews.author: ShaMu

customer_reviews.title: Used on a trip to Africa. Item was exactly ...
customer_reviews.text: Used on a trip to Africa. Item was exactly as advertised. It worked as I wanted it to do. I would order again from the supplier.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best insect repellent i have tried (and i have tried many as i always have terrible reactions). From Costa Rica to Belize to the back yard, this stuff is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great repellant
customer_reviews.text: We liked this lotion. The Off spray always messes up our toenail polish so having this option to just rub it on works a lot better. It does feel thick but we went into some buggy territory in Tennessee and we came away with no bites.
customer_reviews.author: CDMcG

customer_reviews.title: Worked very well in the Amazon jungle
customer_reviews.text: We used this in the Amazon jungle. Usually just applied it once in the morning before we went out hiking or whatever for the day. Nothing is 100% effective, but using this we only got a handful of bites and usually on unprotected areas like hand, or our bare feet when we did a little kayaking. Would highly recommend this product. No need to get crazy high % deet products.
customer_reviews.author: CaveTeam

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us in Turks & Caicos
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I went to Turks & Caicos Islands and were eaten alive while dining at an outdoor restaurant (oh the irony!). We applied this product (the only one we took with us) per the instructions and were both itching mosquito bites for days. Maybe we did something wrong, or were bitten by something immune to this stuff, I'm not sure, but I am disappointed in the performance. It did go on easily and absorb quickly without a terrible smell. Overall, I'm not sure if I'd purchase it again, and I'd also treat my clothes and shoes with another repellent just to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: SNayak

customer_reviews.title: No more bites
customer_reviews.text: Awesome stuff. We had a flea problem in the house. While the flea treatments were starting to work, they were still biting the heck out of my girlfriend. Bug spray was awful smelling and did not keep them off. This cream had no oder and immediately stopped the biting. If I could give 10 stars I would, this stuff works wonders.
customer_reviews.author: B. Pasmore

customer_reviews.title: Good for safari
customer_reviews.text: Works! Used it for my safari trip and did not get any insect bite.
customer_reviews.author: Juland

customer_reviews.title: Works much better then the liquid spray on stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Works much better then the liquid spray on stuff. Lasts longer and doesn't melt your plastics like the 100% sprays do.
customer_reviews.author: SvenTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Put in on, don't get bit.
customer_reviews.text: Put it on ... you won't get bit. That's all there is to it.
customer_reviews.author: William T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very effective and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. A small quantity applied to the bare skin areas is very effective
customer_reviews.author: Richard Lee

customer_reviews.title: Insect Repellent Lotion that actually works
customer_reviews.text: Excellent insect repellent that can be used on your face and body. It did keep the bugs from biting !
customer_reviews.author: Peace Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Damaged item
customer_reviews.text: Leaving review because the item came damaged and I cannot return it. Lots of the repellent had oozed out from a large slit on the top of the item
customer_reviews.author: volley02

customer_reviews.title: Try this, and you'll never use a spray repellant again!
customer_reviews.text: Ultrathon is absolutely the best, most cost-effective insect repellant I've found. It even works in the jungles of my home in Central America, where avoiding insect bites is a daily battle. Ultrathon's a "must have" for anyone living in a mosquito-prone area.
customer_reviews.author: RunsWithScissors

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great in Central America and protected me all day.
customer_reviews.author: Sound Mixer Spock

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Rich cream that works well w/o choking you with the typical repellant smell. Great for traveling ~ no aerosol formulation to worry about transporting. Used on my horse as well!
customer_reviews.author: Anne M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This repellent works well. I used it on several camping trips and it lasted through a 3 hour hike.
customer_reviews.author: Sense 101

product_meta.title: 3M SRL-12 Ultrathon Insect Repellent Lotion, 2 oz
product_meta.description:
The Ultrathin Insect Repellent Lotion delivers excellent protection against biting insects, so you can enjoy the great outdoors without the worry. Designed to provide long-lasting mosquito repellency in some of the world's harshest environments, this insect repellent delivers up to 12 hours of powerful protection from mosquitoes with innovative 3M Time-Release Technology. This mosquito repellent utilizes a polymer to trap DEET and slowly release it over skin surfaces to provide protection you can rely on for your whole family. This insect repellent is proven to repel mosquitoes that may carry viruses such as Sika, West Nile and Dengue Fever. So get out there, get dirty and explore the wonders of nature­–but first protect yourself and your loved ones with Ultrathin Insect Repellent Lotion.

MANUFACTURER CONTACT INFORMATION
651-575-5000
feature_bullets: Contains 34. 34% DEET for superb protection against insect bites
Proven to repel mosquitoes, ticks, biting flies, chiggers, gnats, fleas and deer flies
Repels mosquitoes that may carry Sika Virus, West Nile Virus, Dengue Fever, Chikungunya and deer ticks that may carry Lyme Disease
